Ali's JSON-RPC Framework documentation

1.0

Description
This framework aims to provide JSON-RPC support to your Objective-C programs. Its role is to have a simple API to query any WebService that can be called using JSON-RPC.
This framework currently support JSON-RPCversion 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0.
  • Overview
    • Create a JSONRPCService object
    • Call a remote procedure of the WebService using JSON-RPC
    • Handle the response from the server
      • Converting the JSON response to a custom class
    • Release the service
  • Error management
    • Catching Errors
    • The different error cases and their error domains
  • Example

Note:
